snippet.title: MICROVANIA: a tiny adventure platformer where every button is an upgrade!
snippet.description:
Don't click here: https://bit.ly/35L4LXh 
Download free and more: https://www.5mgsite.com/post/microvania-a-tiny-adventure-platformer-where-every-button-is-an-upgrade

Microvania is a short metroidvania game developed by BluebsTopCat where you play as a wizard where each keyboard button is an upgrade that will give you new abilities to explore the game map in search of a mysterious item.

NEW - 5mg Magazine #7 - Demons of Asteborg:  https://www.5mgsite.com/magazine
Subscribe and get access to news and our Discord server: https://mailchi.mp/1d6e93f3d1cb/5mg

#indiegames #indiegames2021 #homebrewgames2021

- Become a member: https://bit.ly/3uDuQ5A

Our Low-cost PC:

- Motherboard: https://amzn.to/3Dr8ojp
- Ram: https://amzn.to/3BaWb1f
- SSD: https://amzn.to/3mnRPO7
- Video Card: https://amzn.to/3D6wm30
- Power: https://amzn.to/2ZNsZQ8

******************************************
Our website: http://www.5mgsite.com

******************************************
Our Social Medias
Instagram: @5mgofficial


Subscrite to our channel, thumbs up the video, share it with your friends and visit our website.

Note¹: This is not a guide, but my experience playing games, sometimes, for the first time.
